pr_title: Hive-24287: Using SHA-512 for Cookie signature

timeline.message: Hive-24287: Using SHA-512 for Cookie signature

timeline.bodyText: Does the change have backward compatible issues?
timeline.author: yongzhi

replies.bodyText: No. If the cookie doesn't match, it would ask for credentials for the first time or send the newly generated cookie.
replies.author: saihemanth-cloudera
